problem_text_cn: 如图,七边形ABCDEFG中,AB、ED的延长线交于点O,若∠1、∠2、∠3、∠4对应的邻补角和等于215°,则∠BOD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the heptagon ABCDEFG, the extended lines of AB and ED intersect at point O. If the sum of the adjacent complementary angles corresponding to ∠1, ∠2, ∠3, and ∠4 is equal to N_0, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
raw_answer: 在DO延长线上找一点M,如图所示,∵多边形AOEFG的外角和为360°,∴∠BOM=360°-215°=145°,∠BOD+∠BOM=180°∴∠BOD=180°-∠BOM=180°-145°=35°.故选B
raw_comment: 本题考查了多边形的内角与外角以及邻补角,解题的关键是根据多边形的外角和为360°找出∠BOM=145°.
